title: Maternal Balance Stretch Mark Cream for Pregnancy & After, C-Section Scar Treatment with Cocoa Butter and Shea Butter
description: Don't be fooled by other brands that offer you miracles. Maternal Balance Stretch Mark Cream and C-Section Scar Treatment does not make false promises to 100% prevent stretch marks or totally remove existing stretch marks and c-section scars. No product will do this for most cases. The best results are obtained when you begin using Maternal Balance during pregnancy, ideally before stretch marks even begin. But even old stretch mark removal or reduction is possible. We do promise that if you use Maternal Balance regularly you will see results, or we'll refund your money. Maternal Balance Stretch Mark Cream and C-Section Scar Treatment is made in the U.S. with only the highest quality ingredients
